name: Plate
description: Creates a Plate from a Polyline or Polylines.

inputParameters.name: OutlineTop
inputParameters.description: Primary outline that defines shape of plate.

inputParameters.name: OutlineBottom
inputParameters.description: Secondary outline to generate plate edge. must have same number of segments as Outline.

inputParameters.name: Vector
inputParameters.description: Determines direction of the plate extrusion

inputParameters.name: updateRefObj
inputParameters.description: (optional) If True, the attributes in the referenced object will be updated/overwritten with the new values given here.
